name: Roy Tang
text: Also, our Meralco bill currently has a breakdown for components like generation charge, does the 'retail cost" mentioned in your last sentence mean there are additional costs bundled into this component so that as a consumer we don't get the price "on a facility basis"? If so, perhaps that should be broken down in the billing statement as well.

source_obj.text: Also, our Meralco bill currently has a breakdown for components like generation charge, does the 'retail cost" mentioned in your last sentence mean there are additional costs bundled into this component so that as a consumer we don't get the price "on a facility basis"? If so, perhaps that should be broken down in the billing statement as well.
